# Government Tender Announcement

### Title

Lab Services Grad Student

### Reference Number

PW-22-01011137

### Amendment Number

0

### Solicitation Number

30003291

### Publication Date

2022-10-25

### Tender Closing Date

2022-11-08T13:00:00

### Tender Description

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) is seeking a graduate student to assist with the care and maintenance of fish at its facility (PSEC). The student will be involved in the initial startup over the summer and throughout the study. Due to delays in grant approval and fish availability, the DFO requires immediate assistance.

### Contract Details

* Duration: 2022-11-15 to 2024-09-30
* Time frame of delivery: 2022-11-15 to 2024-09-30

### Tender Status

This tender has expired.

### Contact Information

* Name: Terri Jones
* Email: [Terri.Jones@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:Terri.Jones@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)
* Phone: 506-461-3743
* Address: 301 Bishop Drive, Fredericton, NB E3C 2M6

### Procurement Details

* Procurement Category: SRV
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Limited tendering
* Trade Agreements: None
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Regions of Delivery: British Columbia

### Attachments

You can view the tender documents and attachments at the following links:

* [English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/25/f8c327bab9fdf743f9b0688fd9c1ed6d/30003291_acan_eng.pdf)
